actions.name: t
actions.description:
'track' - Begin tracking current project. Available Option:

name:		'Name of project', creates a new project. If it includes spaces, be sure to encapsulate in quotes
use:		value is list number, switches 'current' project to that list item and starts tracking

actions.name: l
actions.description:
'list' - offers a selectable list; used for switching between existing projects


=======================================

'Run', Available Options:

name:		'The project name', create a new project, but don't start tracking
use:		value is list number, switches 'current' project to that list item

actions.name: record
actions.description: Open record in Visual Studio Code

actions.name: T
actions.description: List all project times by date
